product_name: IT CosmeticsConfidence in a Gel Cream Oil-Free Moisturizer
summary: SummaryHighlightsVeganGive BackIT Cosmetics Confidence in a Gel Cream Oil-Free Moisturizer is your ultra-light, breathable face moisturizer that reduces shine, beats oil, and boosts hydration for balanced skin now and over time.
details: DetailsBenefitsOil-free moisturizer balances skin, boosts hydration and absorbs excess oilNon-comedogenicVegan: No animal-derived ingredientsKey IngredientsAnti-Aging Armour Rejuvenating Concentrate:Peptides: Help hydrate, improve elasticity, skin firmness and smooth the look of fine lines Oil Control System:Airlicium: A breakthrough technology, this unique, lightweight aerogel provides a blurring effect and helps to absorb excess sebumPHA: helps improve skin textureResearch Results26% reduction in excess oil*95% said skin felt hydrated & moisturized*****Based on expert grading in a clinical study after 4 weeks of use.***Based on 4-week results in a consumer test.Item 2617433How To UseApply Confidence in a Gel Cream Oil-Free Moisturizer to clean skin in the morning and night.Start with a generous quarter-size amount and evenly disperse to cheeks, chin, forehead and nose.Using upward sweeping motions, smooth gently onto face to reveal fresh, hydrated skin.For your most confident skin, be sure to follow with Confidence in an Eye Cream morning and night.IngredientsAqua / Water / Eau, Glycerin, Butylene Glycol, Niacinamide, Dimethicone, Alcohol Denat., Betaine, Coco-Caprylate/Caprate, Squalane, Ammonium Acryloyldimethyltaurate/Vp Copolymer, Hydroxyethylpiperazine Ethane Sulfonic Acid, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice Powder, Sarcosine, Adenosine, Gluconolactone, Menthoxypropanediol, Methyldihydrojasmonate, Palmitoyl Tetrapeptide-7, Palmitoyl Tripeptide-1,Sodium Hydroxide, Tetrasodium Glutamate Diacetate, Zinc Pca, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Silica Silylate, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Aluminum Starch Octenylsuccinate, Carbomer, Cetearyl Alcohol, Cetearyl Glucoside, Polysorbate 20, Sodium Lactate, Stearyl Dimethicone , Limonene, Linalool, CI 42090 / Blue 1, Chlorphenesin, Phenoxyethanol , Parfum / Fragrance.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Apply Confidence in a Gel Cream Oil-Free Moisturizer to clean skin in the morning and night.Start with a generous quarter-size amount and evenly disperse to cheeks, chin, forehead and nose.Using upward sweeping motions, smooth gently onto face to reveal fresh, hydrated skin.For your most confident skin, be sure to follow with Confidence in an Eye Cream morning and night.

reviews.headline: Very light and hydrating
reviews.comments: I really enjoy this gel cream. I have been using it for about a month. I have combo skin. Normal to oily and this cream keeps me matte a little longer. Usually I have to blot my T zone 3 hours after makeup application. But with this cream I wait 5 hours. So I'm happy.

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again it's amazing
reviews.comments: I usually hate putting moisturizer because I hate the feeling of being so oily on my face I already have super oily skin specifically right now during the summer but this one is amazing it's water base and does not leave me greasy and works great under my makeup sunscreen and primer

reviews.headline: not good
reviews.comments: product is sticky and doesn't dry. leaves a  film on your face. made me break out.

reviews.headline: Can't recommend
reviews.comments:
This new version is not at all better than It confidence gel lotion in pump. 
I will be looking for another brand of moisturizer. No stars can be given! Unfortunately in order to leave your review it needs a star!

reviews.headline: My all time favorite moisturizer!!
reviews.comments: I have combo skin and am 46 so also need to care for aging skin as well. This stuff is the freakin bomb. Been using for about a year now and my skin has never looked better.

reviews.headline: Opposite Effect
reviews.comments: This had the opposite effect on me - rather than making my face hydrated, it was heavy and made my skin feel oily. I shared it with my bf who has notoriously dry skin, and it made his face break out. Now I'm stuck with an expensive moisturizer I can't use

reviews.headline: Not right for MY skin type
reviews.comments: This product is incredible at keeping oil at bay. I have alwsys had super oily skin that within and hour my face was shiny. My con is because when it comes to this product i am not oily enough and it actually dries my face out. That being said, this product does what its advertised to do and feels luxurious going on the skin. I love the gel texture and will probably keep it to use on days that i will be out all day with a full face of makeup or for the summer months. Absolutely would recommend if you have very oily skin!!

reviews.headline: Light weight Moisturizer
reviews.comments: I really love my new Moisturizer by IT. Perfect for my combination skin that easily breaks out!

reviews.headline: I'd recommend!
reviews.comments: I've been looking for something to replace my old faithful beinfait totale lancome cream and I really love this one. I do have oily skin and this wears well underneathe my chanel foundation. For context I usually use Georgette Klinger Marula primer too before applying foundation. Doesn't leave my skin dry looking or cakey at all. I would absolutely recommend trying this.

reviews.headline: Very light and clean
reviews.comments: Very light product, but very good for moisturizing

reviews.headline: Sloughs off
reviews.comments: when I put it on, and if I scratch or rub my face even a little, in come off like I haven't exfoliated in 6 months. I have to let it sit then rub it off on a towel because it just sloughs off. I also noticed zero difference. for the price, I'll stick to plain lotion.

reviews.headline: HOLY GRAIL PRODUCT!!
reviews.comments: This moisturizer is AMAZING!  For reference I have combination skin. It blurs pores, is super moisturizing, but not greasy at all, plumps skin and gives you a gorgeous, flawless glow.

reviews.headline: Does NOT help my oily skin
reviews.comments:
I love the regular confidence in a cream face lotion so much and it was on sale but sold out so since i have MAJOR OILY SKIN i decided to try this one. It makes my skin extra shiny and extra oily. My boyfriend made a comment that my skin looks extra oily when i use it. 

So, its a no for me dawg

reviews.headline: I like
reviews.comments: While I do like this formula my skin is so dry and it yearns for something more hydrating. I have srojens though so that's probably why. Worth a try though.

reviews.headline: Yes I would love it!!
reviews.comments: Great product will purchase again.

reviews.headline: Not a good substitute
reviews.comments: I bought this to replace Confidence in a Gel Lotion. It would be great aside from the fact that it caused milia on my face and neck. I hate it when companies discontinue products that work for sensitive skin and we're left trying to figure out which expensive products wont ruin our skin.

reviews.headline: If you have oily skinâ€¦ BUY THIS!
reviews.comments: I suffer from oily skin, I have spent so much money trying to find a good face gel cream that works on my oily skin and this was the only thing that worked for me. It doesnt leave my skin oily after a 10+hour shift. I also have really sensitive skin and this worked on me with 0 issues.

reviews.headline: Will not buy again.
reviews.comments: Yuck. I had high hopes for this product, but was disappointed overall. Smells good, but made my skin feel dry and dull. I'll stick with their other product, Confidence in a Cream ( which i love).

reviews.headline: Not worth the investment
reviews.comments: Has a really strong fragrance similar to hairspray. Does not dry down all the way and leaves a tacky and sticky film. Would not work under makeup. Would not be  good for sensitive skin.

reviews.headline: Love it!!
reviews.comments: My skin texture has improved in just two weeks, and my oily skin has completely done a 180! I had severly oily skin and this has helped control the oils! I love it soooo much! Its gentle enough on my eczema too. I just wish it was in a squeeze tube instead of a jar so it could be more sanitary.

media.headline: This product is a face changer!
media.caption:
I received this product from @bzzagent for my honest review. 
I received Confidence in a Gel Cream plus oil control by It Cosmetics. @itcosmetics
I absolutely love this moisturizer! It helps control sebum, oil and wrinkles. Its formulated with niacinamide, a peptide complex, squalene, airlucium, zinc pca and pha. 
I've been using this moisturizer for almost 3 weeks and I've noticed great progress in my skin! I wake up with less oil, my pores are tighter (bc you can't completely get rid of them) and my fine lines are finer.
#bzzagent #itcosmetics #productreview #gamechanger

faceoff_positive.comments:
I'm in love with Confidence in a Gel Cream Oil Control. I've used other gel creams before but none that controlled my oil production. 

I love that this gel cream was made with nacinamide, I definitely see the difference in my skin texture and brightness. I've been using this product night and day for 2 weeks and it hasn't caused me any extra breakouts or rashes. Which I was concerned about since there is a slight fragrance. 

All in all, it does help my oiliness and my skin/makeup has never looked better. I would purchase this and would recommend to try if your skin is oily.
faceoff_positive.headline: Never tried IT Cosmetics but I'm in LOVE!

faceoff_negative.comments: I think it is a okay kind of product. It is neither too good nor too bad. The thing that I most liked about this product is the fragrance. It is not very strong and smells extremely natural. The lemony/citrus fragrance is just so calming and soothing. The moisturizer perfectly blends into your skin and is very convenient to apply. I liked the look of the moisturizer, especially it's sea green color. I also liked the feel of the product and it's texture. It is very compatible with other skincare products. I have used it after serum and before sunscreen and it is easy to use along with them. Though it is convenient to spread on your face and neck yet it doesn't completely melts into your skin and I think this is the downside of the product. I have used this moisturizer during nighttime too and I felt the product peeling off from my face the other day in the morning. It does help the shiny aspect of oily skin but I am curious to know if this moisturizer is just meant to control the shiny part or it does actually provide the benefits of actual moisturizer. I didn't notice any hydration benefit from this moisturizer. I would rather prefer a moisturizer that is a complete package instead. The one that is hydrating and controls the shine too. Overall it is a average product in my opinion.
faceoff_negative.headline: I found this product average!!
